settings.subheading: We turn complex designs into production-ready reality subhead: specialized in high-end beaded, crochet, and faux fur textile engineering for global fashion houses.
settings.title: Fominte Custom Studio

settings.sub_title1: Our technical team is ready to discuss your design, recommend materials, and optimize for production efficiency.
settings.sub_title2: We provide A4 swatches and sample yardage. Bring your vision to life before committing to bulk production.
settings.sub_title3: Your custom designs are your intellectual property. We guarantee strict Confidentiality and exclusivity.
settings.sub_title4: From boutique orders to large-scale manufacturing, our facility is equipped to handle your volume needs.

settings.html:
Fominte Custom Studio

WE TURN COMPLEX DESIGNS INTO PRODUCTION-READY REALITY SUBHEAD: Specialized in high-end beaded, crochet, and faux fur textile engineering for global fashion houses.

Beyond Manufacturing, Building Brands

At Fominte, we see ourselves as more than just a supplier. We are a creative workshop, a partner in innovation, and an extension of your team. Our mission is to translate your unique brand vision into tangible, high-quality products that resonate with your audience.

The Five Studios

Our comprehensive capabilities, unified under one roof.

BEADED & EMBROIDERED FABRIC

  • Handles multi-layered embellishments (sequins + beads + thread).
  • Compatible with delicate base fabrics like silk and tulle without puckering.

MODERN CROCHET

  • Machine-crochet with a hand-made look for scalability.
  • Customizable gauge and yarn blends (cotton, wool, metallic).

FASHION FABRICS

  • Vast library of trend-driven textiles, updated seasonally.
  • Rapid customization of colors and finishes based on current collections.

POLAR FLEECE INNOVATION

  • Engineered for high-performance: anti-pilling, moisture-wicking, and thermal regulation.
  • Sustainable options available using recycled polyester fibers.

ECO-FUR DESIGN

  • Achieves varied pile heights (from 15mm to over 100mm).
  • Advanced tipping and printing techniques for realistic animal patterns.

The Customization Journey

A transparent and collaborative process from start to finish.

1

Consult & Concept

2

Material R&D & Prototyping

3

Precision Production

4

QA & Global Delivery

Inspiration Gallery

Visual stories of craftsmanship and design.

Ready to bring your vision to life?

settings.content: whether you already have a designed fabric or want to design a new one,we can provide custom fashion fabric services.

At Fominte, we see ourselves as more than just a supplier. We are a creative workshop, a partner in innovation, and an extension of your team. Our mission is to translate your unique brand vision into tangible, high-quality products that resonate with your audience.
